com.simsilica.ethereal.zone

Class ZoneGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.ethereal.zone.ZoneGrid

  • public class ZoneGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Can translate to/from integer-based grid coordinates and world real coordinates. Note: Zones are essentially 2 dimensional in the 'ground' plane, by JME convention: x, z

      • toLongId

        public long toLongId(ZoneKey key)
        Converts the x, y, z to a single long by masking each value and bit shifting. This effectively means the zone x,y,z values are limited to 2^21 (+/- 2^20) but that's probably ok for all reasonable implementations. It's over a million zones in every direction.

      • fromLongId

        public ZoneKey fromLongId(long id)
